main event: Ten bright objects were observed in a V-formation in Augusta, Maine on 15 November 1954, appearing to dissolve.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 7 minutes,The objects were described as being bright and in a straight flight path,The conditions at the time were clear with no sounds reported from the objects,Comments indicated the objects could be anything from high altitude planes to low altitude birds,The number of objects was confirmed to be ten in formation.
witness description: Civilians and military personnel observed the objects
